title: Photoshare
description: Social Network to share posts with images. Like your friends Posts ❤︎ !.

title: Flappy Bird AI
description: Simple AI that learns to play flappy bird following the neat algorithm. Consist of a Genetic Algorithm for the generation of evolving Artificial Neural Networks. Alters weights and network structure in each generation.

title: Conway's Game of Life
description: Simple Conway's Game of life built on C with command line interface.
